Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{3: 'It is the afternoon of the following day when Bella enters Base South-3.'}
{3: 'Noan is looking down at the manga in his hands, reading silently. The only thing different from before is that he is using a pear blossom as the bookmark.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bella', 3: 'I thought you were taking a walk. You went to pick flowers?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'Hard to find a pear tree these days.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Any news?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sits across Noan with a solemn expression.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "She died... three years ago. She got ill. Didn't even live to see the rebellion.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'She left this journal before she died and gave her possessions to a friend.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bella waves the thin booklet in her hand.'}

{2: 'Bella', 3: "She kept believing that... things would get better after the rebellion won. There would be schools on the lower level; people wouldn't have to fight for food or the bathroom. Then she would be brave enough to find me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'What do you think? Has her dream come true... or has everything gone to shit?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She struggles to hold back her tears.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Don't you cry. Tears are useless. They can't save anyone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "...Don't repeat what my mom would say. And aren't you the one crying?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He is sobbing too.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "So what if I repeat her words? That just proves that it's a universal truth passed down from generation to generation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Just because it's passed down from our elders doesn't mean it's true. A lot of their ideas are outdated.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "It's still better than those fantasies you won't stop reading. Ordinary folks will never become the all-powerful heroes in your Cardman Rider books.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Cardman Riders aren't all-power. Their stories are captivating only because they struggle too.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'They both look up and frown, their grief suppressed again.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "The real world isn't like your story. We don't always stand back up after we fall.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'So you do realize that? I thought you were all "adversity builds character," like your books.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Adversity is always destructive. I'm just willing to believe that it can make me a better person.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "That's just wishful thinking you use to make yourself feel better.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Nothing wrong with making yourself feel better. People aren't supposed to stay stuck.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'You smiled so freely when I first met you, but look at your face now. Stuck, see?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Surely someone who never smiles doesn't get to say that about me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bella sneers.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'What happened on the train that day that made you this way?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Haven't you been listening to what people were saying?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Those were their stories, not yours. Shrek isn't your real name, is it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Does it matter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Obviously. A name represents a person's past and present.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Some past is just trouble. I don't want to explain and justify myself wherever I go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "If that still bothers you, then you haven't made peace with your past.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "I couldn't bring them back even if I made peace. Haven't you also hidden many things from me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'You never asked.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Will you answer if I ask now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Me neither.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Doesn't it bother you when partners don't communicate with each other?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "What's wrong with the way we were? We could talk about our books.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'Would that have gotten anything through your thick skull? You have to learn to move past your regrets.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'The same goes for you, I reckon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'I need time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Sure, but so do I.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As their conversation comes to an impasse, Bella changes the subject, her brows furrowed.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'Will you go back to Asslam?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'And do what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Fair. As long as Ashlar and his people are there, there's no way you can return... Do you want to keep going with me, then?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Where will you go?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "I'm planning to stay here for a while before deciding where to go next. There can't be anything worse out there, after all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Can I offer you a new, blessed name in this trying time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "That won't be necessary.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "I've seen the worst life has to offer. This is as bad as it gets; things can only go up from here.", 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Who could have known how bad things could get?'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "It didn't take a disaster, just some other Scavengers like us that we didn't watch out for. Then you were gone."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Thank you, Bella.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'I should have said that sooner.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'You found me when I was completely lost, and you helped me along the way…'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "You could be quite annoying sometimes—but I suppose there's blame to share. Had I not met you, I wouldn't be standing here, safe and sound."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "So, thank you... and I'm sorry... I never told you my story."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '"Spring will return... Your favorite flowers will bloom again..." Only when you told me that did I realize...'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...I never got to tell you how I got the pear blossoms in my books.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'We were always hiding our past, so we could only talk about the books we loved.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'You might have become a merchant for the Forsaken like I did if you had survived. Who knows? Maybe eventually we could be honest with each other... and become real friends.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "...It's too late for any of that, isn't it?"}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Mom, Captain Rachel, Field, Shauna, Niino, Weyland, Ed, Aunt Hill... Everyone I cared for on the train is gone...'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '...Will you go back to Asslam?'}
{3: "The phantom keeps repeating Bella's words at random. The young man is not bothered and instead starts chatting with the familiar voice."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "There's no reason to return anymore."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'I ran into Mike at a Forsaken base a few months ago. He told me Niino had passed too.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'He said...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory345.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Captain Mike', 3: "Niino's old injuries had long-lasting complications in the first place. He was eating less and less in the last few years, and last month he fell asleep one night and never woke up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Mike', 3: 'He knew that you survived, and he heard I was preparing to leave Akdilek, so he asked me to give you back your things.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Mike', 3: 'He said no one on the train was going to keep an eye on your things after he was gone.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mike took out a familiar backpack filled with things Noan left behind.'}
{3: "The short sword Noan used, the weapon designs Rachel gave him, Field's journal, and a manga with a bookmark resting between the pages."}
{2: 'Captain Mike', 3: 'I was going to bring you a piece of candy, but I lost it on my way here. Sigh.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Mike', 3: "You gave my niece your candy on your eleventh birthday, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'That was so long ago...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: 'I asked him about Asslam, and that was when I found out Ashlar was gone for good.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'A lot of things are getting better there. Perhaps a school will show up on the lower level in a few years like your mother wished.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "He said our sacrifices weren't in vain...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns around, patting the border collie by his side, deep in thought.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'So he decided to leave Akdilek and started a new journey.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "So have I... After you were gone, I started to teach myself how to perform surgery. There is still a lot I don't understand…", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'But whatever I can do, I want to give it my all. I want to stay with other people and contribute like I did.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Eventually, I had an arrangement with the Forsaken and became one of their merchants.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'But the Red Tide flooded the cities again after the disaster at the Pulia Forest Park Ruins... And it took so many lives.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He stared at the projected phantom in the Red Tide and pauses.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'They never stopped fighting, no matter how hopeless it was, even if it cost their lives. The way they fought reminded me of the people on the train.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory142.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'I was still confused about what came out of my choices and our rebellion after I left Asslam.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'What is the point of it when none of you are here anymore, even if our dream has come true?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Only when I saw those who would die defending the people from this calamity did I realize... I was right not to give Ashlar the terminal that day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'I would have betrayed them if I had compromised. Their sacrifices would have been in vain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Spring will come like you said...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...Winter does not take, for some would light fires with their souls.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan looks up and chuckles wryly.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Someone dies defending against this disaster every second... They build a dam with their lives to keep the flood out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "I would have made the same choices I did if I was in the same situation, wouldn't I?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Not because I've decided to give up the possibility they gave me... I'm just making the same choice they did. I'm passing this ticket to the future to someone else.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Goodbye, Bella. I have to take Matches to the Forsaken base. They're still waiting for these serums.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "I'm glad I got to hear your voice again, but I hope this is the last time I run into the Red Tide.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Yes. I remember it now.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_12.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_12.jpg'}
{3: "Conservation area 045, Gray Raven, and the unconscious commandant... I've met them before..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2301_7.jpg'}
{3: 'I did make the same choice when I returned to the train with the Forsaken.'}
{3: "The young Construct didn't recognize me, but Jamilah did..."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_12.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_12.jpg'}
{3: "I don't regret anything..."}
{3: "—I've received many gifts from many people in my life. Therefore, I'm willing to sacrifice everything I have in exchange for other people's futures."}
{3: '—I am loved, and I love them.'}
{3: '—Our deaths and decays are not meaningless. They are the cinders that light up the night.'}
{3: '—They may only be as bright as fireflies, but small and frail as their flames may be, they are enough to light a fuse. All possibilities stem from a big bang, after all.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_13.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_13.jpg'}
{3: 'Noan slowly opens his eyes, having found his answer during his slumber.'}
{3: 'Despite the scars all over his body and the constraint that makes him hard to move, all his memories are back, and he is no longer lost.'}
